remarks: Betweeness always holds for the second endpoint.  Theorem 3.1 of [Schwabhauser] p. 30.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Mar-2019.)
statement:
tkgeom.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tkgeom.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
tkgeom.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tkgeom.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
tgbtwntriv2.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
tgbtwntriv2.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
tgbtwntriv2 $p |- ( ph -> B e. ( A I B ) ) $.
